data.lyric:
[ti:Gyalis(feat. Capella Grey) (Remix|Explicit)]
[ar:Novabigsteppa/Capella Grey]
[al:Gyalis (feat. Capella Grey) (Remix) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.41]Gyalis(feat. Capella Grey) (Remix|Explicit) - Novabigsteppa/Capella Grey
[00:01.61]Lyrics by：Brittany Caine/Capella Grey
[00:02.35]Composed by：Brittany Caine/Capella Grey
[00:03.36]I see her
[00:05.41]She came with her n***a
[00:07.23]
[00:08.06]You already know she wanna slide with me
[00:09.82]One thing 'bout these women
[00:10.74]They gon' risk it all to vibe with me
[00:12.31]I don't wanna break up a happy home
[00:13.85]Turn on my savage mode
[00:15.12]But you know how I get sometimes
[00:16.20]
[00:17.08]I could see her watching from a distance
[00:18.47]
[00:19.01]Shawty so persistent
[00:19.63]
[00:20.21]She want me to ease her mind
[00:21.45]
[00:22.06]She trynaaaaaa
[00:24.18]Post up on the gram
[00:25.14]Actin' like she really love her man
[00:26.29]
[00:26.91]I'm like oh nah
[00:28.13]
[00:28.68]She for the streets
[00:29.49]Can't invite her to the crib I know she never gonna leave
[00:31.73]They wanna know why the girls can't leave me alone
[00:33.53]
[00:34.07]I need a Patek cause it's just some different timing I'm on
[00:36.50]They wanna know how I get whatever I want
[00:39.32]Like what is the reason
[00:41.12]Yea yea hmm
[00:42.41]
[00:42.91]Mmm just get it right I'm outside
[00:44.46]
[00:45.26]She came to the door with nothing on when I arrived
[00:47.58]Pull up she got her clothes off from the walk-in
[00:50.24]She won't waste no time oh
[00:52.11]
[00:52.68]She don't want nobody else I know
[00:54.42]
[00:55.02]But I can't be what she wants
[00:57.06]They all have the same story
[00:59.67]They all want me to themselves
[01:01.95]But I'm a gyalis
[01:03.98]The city is my palace
[01:05.22]What I'ma do
[01:06.69]'Cause I want she and she and she
[01:09.80]
[01:10.32]She want me
[01:11.00]
[01:11.62]To come and rub up on her bumpa
[01:13.00]
[01:14.07]And she be tryna cuddle in the summer
[01:15.69]
[01:16.24]But I can't give you what you want I gotta go
[01:19.00]Don't go telling all ya friends keep it on the low
[01:21.17]I can't help it girl you know I want
[01:22.28]I want she and she and she
[01:25.18]And they love them some me
[01:27.34]
[01:27.92]I can't even speak
[01:30.16]To all of 'em so I call her on the FaceTime
[01:32.78]She gon' pick up on the first ring
[01:34.50]
[01:35.05]Ooh I got her wrapped around my d**n finger
[01:36.97]
[01:37.67]I will never tell a soul oh no no
[01:39.77]
[01:40.32]Mm girl we grown
[01:42.21]The life of a gyalis
data.trans:
[ti:Gyalis(feat. Capella Grey) (Remix|Explicit)]
[ar:Novabigsteppa/Capella Grey]
[al:Gyalis (feat. Capella Grey) (Remix) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.41]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:01.61]//
[00:02.35]//
[00:03.36]我看见她
[00:05.41]她和她的兄弟一起来的
[00:07.23]
[00:08.06]你已经知道她想和我在一起
[00:09.82]关于这些女人有一点
[00:10.74]他们会不顾一切地和我在一起
[00:12.31]我不想破坏幸福的家庭
[00:13.85]开启我的野蛮模式
[00:15.12]但你知道有时候我会很难过
[00:16.20]
[00:17.08]我看见她在远处注视着我
[00:18.47]
[00:19.01]姑娘坚持不懈
[00:19.63]
[00:20.21]她想要我安慰她
[00:21.45]
[00:22.06]她想要
[00:24.18]发到网上去
[00:25.14]装作她真的爱她的男人
[00:26.29]
[00:26.91]我说不行
[00:28.13]
[00:28.68]她在街头混
[00:29.49]不能邀请她来家里我知道她永远不会离开
[00:31.73]他们想知道为什么这些女孩离不开我
[00:33.53]
[00:34.07]我需要百达翡丽因为我的时间不一样
[00:36.50]他们想知道我怎么得到想要的一切
[00:39.32]究竟是什么原因
[00:41.12]//
[00:42.41]
[00:42.91]好好表现我就在外面
[00:44.46]
[00:45.26]当我到达时她一丝不挂地走到门口
[00:47.58]开着豪车她在步入式厕所里脱掉衣服
[00:50.24]她不会浪费时间
[00:52.11]
[00:52.68]我知道她不想要别人
[00:54.42]
[00:55.02]但我不能成为她想要的人
[00:57.06]他们的故事都一样
[00:59.67]他们都想把我据为己有
[01:01.95]可我是个姑娘
[01:03.98]这座城市就是我的宫殿
[01:05.22]我要做什么
[01:06.69]因为我想要她
[01:09.80]
[01:10.32]她想要我
[01:11.00]
[01:11.62]来和她缠绵
[01:13.00]
[01:14.07]她想在夏天拥抱我
[01:15.69]
[01:16.24]但我给不了你想要的我得走了
[01:19.00]不要告诉你的朋友保持低调
[01:21.17]我情不自禁你知道我想要的
[01:22.28]我想要她
[01:25.18]他们喜欢我
[01:27.34]
[01:27.92]我说不出话来
[01:30.16]致所有人我和她视频通话
[01:32.78]第一次响起她就会接电话
[01:34.50]
[01:35.05]我把她掌控在手心
[01:36.97]
[01:37.67]我绝不会告诉任何人
[01:39.77]
[01:40.32]姑娘我们长大了
[01:42.21]少女的生活
